name: Toka
greetingText: Or I should miss spell it and say To2a :)
wishText: May God always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: I wish beauty, happines, and peace surround you as they fill your heart and soul. I hope you had a great year and the next year would be full of many blessings and great achivements and ...............................
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: And I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Lastly, sorry if it is not that much but I ran out of resources and ideas ^^
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
